src_original: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩為欲饒益諸有情故，能捨一切內外所有，恒作是念：

src_original: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhyâiva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
tgt_original: 『諸有惡鬼及惡獸等欲噉我身，我當施與令其充足。

src_original: mama ca dānapāramitāparipūrir bhaviṣyati /  abhyāsannā ca bhaviṣyati /  tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo-  [ Cambridge MS f158b ---> ]
tgt_original: 由此善根，令我布施波羅蜜多速得圓滿，疾近無上正等菩提。

src_original: dhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
tgt_original: 我當如是勤修正行，證得無上正等覺時，我佛土中得無一切傍生、餓鬼。

src_original: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 』「又，舍利子！ 是諸菩薩若在曠野有惡賊處亦無怖畏。

src_original: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvôtsṛṣṭakāyenâpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkārôpakaraṇena ca /  tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩為欲饒益諸有情故，能捨一切內外所有樂修諸善，於身、命、財無所顧悋，恒作是念：

src_original: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkārôpakaraṇāni haranti tebhyâivâitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
tgt_original: 『若諸有情競來劫奪我諸資具，我當恭敬歡喜施與；

src_original: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodhôtpādayitavyaḥ /  teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasâparāddhavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 或有因斯害我身命，我終於彼不生瞋恨，亦不發生身、語、意惡。

src_original: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /  anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 由此因緣，令我布施、淨戒、安忍波羅蜜多速得圓滿，疾近無上正等菩提。

src_original: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /  ete cânye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
tgt_original: 我當如是勤修正行，證得無上正等覺時，我佛土中得無一切劫害、怨賊，由我佛土極清淨故，亦無餘惡。

src_original: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatve-  [ Cambridge MS f159a ---> ]  [ Bendall ed p350 ---> ]  tvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 』「又，舍利子！ 是諸菩薩若在曠野無水之處亦無怖畏。

src_original: asaṃtrastadharmāṇo hi bodhisatvā mahāsatvā bhavanti /  evaṃ cânena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 菩薩法爾無諸怖畏，恒作是念：

src_original: sarvasatvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇacchedāya śikṣitavyaṃ /  na bodhisatvena mahāsatvena saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /  saced ahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi /  api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
tgt_original: 『我當求學斷諸有情渴愛之法，不應於此而生怖畏，設我由此渴乏命終，於諸有情必不捨離大悲作意施妙法水。

src_original: aho vatâlpapuṇyâmī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
tgt_original: 奇哉薄福！ 是諸有情居在如斯無水世界。

src_original: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya  satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
tgt_original: 我當如是勤修正行，證得無上正等覺時，我佛土中得無如是一切燋渴乏水曠野。

src_original: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathâṣṭâṅgôpetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
tgt_original: 我當方便勸諸有情修勝福業，隨所在處皆令具足八功德水。
